kv13.8:5.3: Dukkhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci dukkhaṃ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, dukkhaṃ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
kv13.8:5.6: nanu sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṃ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṃ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
kv13.8:5.8: Hañci sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṃ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṃ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:6.3: Dukkhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, sukhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
kv13.8:6.6: nanu sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
kv13.8:6.8: Hañci sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anuseti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:7.5: “so evaṃ anurodhavirodhaṃ samāpanno yaṃ kiñci vedanaṃ vedayati sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā, so taṃ vedanaṃ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
